General.Name: Chongqing Wanli New Energy Co Ltd
General.Description: Chongqing Wanli New Energy Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of lead-acid batteries in China. The company was formerly known as Wanli Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Chongqing Wanli New Energy Co., Ltd. in January 2013. Chongqing Wanli New Energy Co., Ltd. was founded in 1943 and is based in Chongqing, China.
